title: Awesomenauts-TiNYiSO
description:
Description: The year is 3587. Conflict spans the stars as huge robot armies are locked in an enduring stalemate. In their bid for galactic supremacy, they call upon the most powerful group of mercenaries in the universe: the Awesomenauts! Awesomenauts is a MOBA fitted into the form of an accessible 3-on-3 action platformer. Head out to the online battlefields together with your friends as an online party or in local splitscreen, and never worry about having to wait for an online match because of drop-in matchmaking! Devise strategies as you upgrade and customize each characterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s skills to suit your playing style. Expect new items and Awesomenauts to be added regularly!


Features:

* Saturday morning is back Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 3 on 3 online platforming shooter action with a bright 80Ã¢â‚¬Â²s cartoon style
* ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a MOBA! Ã¢â‚¬â€œ classes, upgrades, creeps, turrets, bases and tactical depth are all present.
* The Awesomenauts Ã¢â‚¬â€œ take control of 8 very unique and highly customizable Awesomenauts, each with their own attacks and skills.
* Splitscreen action Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Online and offline play with up to 3 players in local splitscreen
* No waiting Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Full drop-in support in online games, with bots and humans being swapped where needed.
* DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t criticize it, customize it! Ã¢â‚¬â€œ More than 150 unique items to beef up your abilities and customize your Awesomenaut to suit your personal playing style!
* Push it to the limit Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Face melting battles across multiple exotic planets and alien spaceships!


Installation: 

1) Burn image or mount.
2) Run Setup.exe
3) Copy all files from the TiNYiSO folder to the main installation directory.
4) Create a shortcut on your desktop to Awesomenauts Launcher.exe
5) Launch the game and enjoy!

Notice: Awesomenauts is mainly an online team game. This version has been cracked so that you can play the tutorial and then the Practice mode with bots. No other game play modes will work since they require that you be online.


Support the developers whos games you like! After trying it buy it if you can. Its only around $6.70 on Steam if you split the 3 Pack with two of your friends.
